# Mobelo - No-Code Mobile App Builder
# AI-powered platform for creating iOS and Android e-commerce apps

# Site Information
> Name: Mobelo
> Description: Build professional e-commerce mobile apps for iOS and Android without coding. AI-powered platform with integrated Stripe payments, merchant panel, and unlimited products.
> URL: https://mobelo.dev
> Contact: support@mobelo.com
> Category: Mobile App Development Platform

# Key Features
- No-code mobile app builder for e-commerce
- AI-powered app generation (4-8 minutes)
- iOS and Android app publishing
- Integrated Stripe payments
- Full merchant dashboard with RBAC
- Unlimited products and orders
- React Native + Expo 54 apps
- Source code export available

# Main Pages
## Home
https://mobelo.dev
The main landing page showcasing Mobelo's AI-powered mobile app builder for e-commerce.

## Pricing
https://mobelo.dev/pricing
Pricing plans: Starter ($49/mo), Growth ($99/mo), Custom ($199/mo). All plans include unlimited products, merchant panel, and Stripe integration.

## Features
https://mobelo.dev/features
Detailed feature list including AI generation, custom theming, payment processing, and analytics.

## App Builder
https://mobelo.dev/app-builder
Main app creation interface where users design and generate their mobile apps using AI.

## Dashboard
https://mobelo.dev/dashboard
User dashboard for managing created apps, products, orders, and settings.

# Technical Stack
- Frontend: Next.js 14, React 19, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS
- Backend: NestJS, PostgreSQL, TypeORM
- Mobile: React Native, Expo 54, Zustand
- Payments: Stripe (native SDK)
- AI: OpenAI GPT for content generation
- Infrastructure: AWS S3, CloudFront, Redis

# Product Information
## Starter Plan
Price: $49/month + 1% sales commission
- Production-ready mobile app
- Full merchant dashboard
- Unlimited products and orders
- iOS & Android publishing
- Stripe payment integration
- Basic support

## Growth Plan
Price: $99/month + 0.7% sales commission
- Everything in Starter
- Advanced analytics
- Custom integrations
- Source code export
- Priority support

## Custom Plan
Price: $199/month + 0.4% sales commission
- Everything in Growth
- Production website included
- Custom features
- Dedicated support
- White-label option

# Use Cases
1. Small businesses wanting mobile presence without hiring developers
2. E-commerce stores expanding to mobile apps
3. Entrepreneurs testing mobile commerce ideas
4. Agencies building apps for multiple clients
5. Retail businesses modernizing with mobile apps

# FAQ
Q: How long does it take to launch?
A: Mobelo generates your complete mobile app in 4-8 minutes. App Store and Play Store approval may take additional time.

Q: Do I need coding skills?
A: No. Mobelo is completely no-code. AI handles design and development.

Q: Can I publish to both iOS and Android?
A: Yes. One app works on both platforms.

Q: Who owns the app and code?
A: You own everything. Source code export available.

Q: Are there hidden costs?
A: No. Only monthly fee plus sales commission (0.4% to 1% based on plan).

# Authentication Types
1. Platform Owner: Email OTP authentication for dashboard access
2. Staff Members: RBAC system with role-based permissions
3. Mobile Users: OTP/Password/Social login for customer accounts
4. Guest Users: Session-based for browsing and cart management

# API Documentation
Base URL: https://api.mobelo.dev/api
Namespaces:
- /v1/platform/* - Platform user management
- /v1/merchant/* - Product/order management (staff + RBAC)
- /v1/mobile/* - Mobile app endpoints (customers)
